entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Pickering
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 6:33 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing drizzle this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
